content: Sometimes, Lingxuzi can dive at you face first, moving his open jaws up before biting down. You need only dodge his face, meaning you can dodge right into his arms and keep attacking.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Lingxuzi.md', within the main section titled 'Lingxuzi', specifically from the subsection 'Lingxuzi Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Sometimes, Lingxuzi can dive at you face first, moving his open jaws up before biting down. You need only dodge his face, meaning you can dodge right into his arms and keep attacking.
